main_portfolio.title: ARKTASTIC
main_portfolio.description: This e-commerce platform is a product-centric company based in Australia. Notably, the platform is designed to accommodate multiple merchants, allowing them to sell their products. It boasts the capability to integrate external APIs, enhancing its versatility and extending its reach within the e-commerce ecosystem.

main_portfolio.title: ARKTASTIC admin/merchant dashboard
main_portfolio.description: A React-based admin/merchant dashboard connected with a MongoDB backend and utilizing Redux for state management would be a powerful tool for managing various aspects of an e-commerce application.Enables admins to manage products within the system.Functionality includes adding new products, editing existing ones, and removing outdated items. Supports features like product categories, pricing, inventory management, and image uploads.

big_projects.title: The Wild Oasis
big_projects.description: The React project dashboard enables admin login, user creation, booking management (create, update, delete), room management (add, update, delete), and expense calculation. It provides secure authentication, real-time updates on bookings and room availability, and intuitive analytics for informed decision-making. The system ensures data privacy, responsive design for cross-device accessibility, and streamlined hotel operations for efficient guest management. email: user@example.com password:user1234
